terms_prompt:
1. Acceptance of Terms
By using this app, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions.

2. Modifications to Terms
We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Any changes will be posted in the app.

3. Use of the App
You agree to use the app only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.

4. Privacy
We respect your privacy. Please review our privacy policy for more details on how we collect and use your information.

5. User Responsibilities
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your password.

6. Account Termination
We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account if you violate these terms.
